explains: adj. 已贴现的；已折扣的
v. 打折扣（discount 的过去分词）；不重视
wordGroup: discounted cash 现金贴现，贴扣现金
discounted cash flow [经]净现金量；[经]现金流量贴现；[经]减少现金流通
discounted cost 折扣费用；贴现费用

sentences.en: At the factory outlet you'll find discounted items at up to 75% off regular prices.
sentences.cn: 在工厂的直销店里，你会找到比常规价低75%的打折商品。

sentences.en: The news reports were being discounted as propaganda.
sentences.cn: 人们认为这些新闻报道不过是为了宣传，不可全信。

sentences.en: Recently the viewpoint has been revised but not entirely discounted by new research.
sentences.cn: 最近，此观点有所改变，但新研究并未完全否定这一观点。
